description: We are looking for a marketing manager to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and implementing marketing strategies to promote our brand and products. The ideal candidate will have experience with digital marketing and social media.
responsibilities: Develop and implement marketing strategies to promote our brand and products, analyze market trends and customer data, manage the company's social media accounts, collaborate with other departments to ensure brand consistency
education_requirement: Bachelor's degree in Marketing or a related field
experience: At least 3 years of experience in marketing
